summary: 11-21-17 AFTER DRIVING IN THE DARKNESS OF WINTER NOW I HAVE NOTICED MY HEADLIGHTS BOTH RIGHT AND LEFT ARE VERY DIM AND HAR TO SEE THE ROAD AHEAD. MY BRIGHT LIGHTS WORK WELL AND I USE THEM WHEN NO OTHER CARS ARE COMING HEAD ON. I THOUGHT IS WAS MY EYESIGHT BUT STARTED TO INVESTIGATE AND SAW HUNDREDS OF COMPLAINTS ON LINE. HAVE NOT SEEN ANY RECALL NOTICES FOR THIS DANGEROUS HEADLIGHT FAULT. AUTO HEADLIGHTS ARE DIM WHEN DRIVING.
